derivation: from an unused root probably meaning to be hollow;
outline:
1. belly, womb, body
    1. belly, abdomen
      1. as seat of hunger
      2. as seat of mental faculties
      3. of depth of Sheol (fig.)
    2. womb
kjv_def: belly, body, [phrase] as they be born, [phrase] within, womb.
strongs_def: the belly, especially the womb; also the bosom or body of anything
